rooms.Name: The Portal into the Outworld
rooms.Description:
Stepping through the portal, you find yourself in a lousy looking place.
The path looks like a steam roller waltzed over it. The fields look like a war
has been through the area.  The place finishes it's masterpiece by some
dark sky above you.  Maybe you should leave now.

rooms.Name: On the path in the Outworld
rooms.Description:
As you continue on your path, you notice that the sky is getting blacker. You
say to yourself, "Uh, let's go back." Suddenly you see a bunch of people in
front of you. You rush forward, anxious to meet anyone in this area.

rooms.Name: On the path into the Outworld
rooms.Description:
As soon as you begin to walk toward these people, they begin to scream in fear
and terror and begin to run as if the devil himself was on their heels.  You
wonder what has happened here.  As you look around you notice a castle in
the north.  You might find some answers there.

rooms.Name: Just Before the City in the Outworld
rooms.Description:
Just before the gates the air seems to get worse.  Your eyes are burning now
and you are also coughing and wheezing trying to get this air (they call this
air?) into your lungs.  Where's an oxygen mask when you need one?  With your
last ounce of strength, you pull yourself toward the gates of the city.

rooms.Name: At the gates of the city in the Outworld.
rooms.Description:
Finally you reach the gates.  As you breathe oxygen into your lungs, you
look around.  You hear a source of shouting and cheering, but you can't figure
out where it's coming from.

Exits.Description: The gates to the city are in front of you.

rooms.Name: Within the city of the Outworld
rooms.Description:
As you look around, you know you have seen disaster zones that look better than
this.  Nothing but trash and filth as far as the eyes can see.  The cheering you
heard earlier seems to be coming form the north.

rooms.Name: Main Street
rooms.Description:
People are all over the place doing everything from stealing to killing as
well as other gruesome tasks.  Many notice you and begin whispering to others
about you.  As you strain your ears, the only words you can here are "fight,"
"Combat," and "Shao Kahn."  You have no idea what is meant by any of these
words, but you have a bad feeling that you might find out soon.

rooms.Name: Fountain Square
rooms.Description:
This is the best place that you have been at since you arrived here, but it
still looks terrible.  The fountain looks decent enough to drink from though.
All the commotion you are hearing is still coming from the north.

rooms.Name: In Front of Shao Kahn's Castle
rooms.Description:
Here you finally find what all the commotion is about.  There are hundreds of
people here eagerly trying to get into the castle.  And why you ask?  To
either watch or take part in the goriest and perhaps deadliest battle
of all time.  Are you prepared to walk in?  If so, come in and prepare
yourself for Mortal Kombat.  If not, turn around and go back home.  But
don't say I didn't warn you.

Exits.Description: The Castle Doors lead into the tournament grounds.

rooms.Name: Preparation Room
rooms.Description:
You notice many people here checking their armor and equipment very carefully.
You notice that it's very quiet, except for the occasional curse. Suddenly a
charred corpse is tossed into the room.  You hear from the speakers "Will the
next contestant please enter the arena?" There's still a chance to turn back
so you better take it NOW!

Exits.Description: A set of double doors lead the way into the tournament.

rooms.Name: A Ticket Booth
rooms.Description:
Here you find some ticket booths where hundreds of people are standing in line
trying to get one of these tickets.  You wonder if your favorite band is in
town or something like that.  You quit wondering as you look at a life size
poster on the wall. It shows a well built person with what looks like a mask
made out of bone.  He's pointing at you and the caption at the bottom says
"Is that your best?"  You start to worry about what you have gotten yourself
into.

rooms.Name: Tv Cameras and Tons of Cords
rooms.Description:
This combat thing you have been hearing about must be bigger than you thought.
There are televsion crews and reporters all over the place talking to 
participants, and some faithful fans.  You notice a news van south of you.  
You always wondered what's goes on behind the scenes and now here's your big
chance.

Exits.Description:
2
The doors of the newsvan are right behind you.

rooms.Name: Inside the News Van
rooms.Description:
As you sneak inside the van, you notice all of the equipment used behind
the scenes.  Everything from video screens to footage editing machines.
Suddenly someone notices you and orders you out.  Looks like you better
split before things really get ugly.

rooms.Name: Yelling and Screaming
rooms.Description:
Looks like a pier six brawl going on here.  After what you have seen though,
it doesn't surprise you. You drill a couple of people who thought you were an
easy target, but you feel you should probably leave before things really get
out of hand.

rooms.Name: A Side Street
rooms.Description:
Flies are buzzing everywhere around here, thanks to all the garbage, and to your
surprise some corpses that have half rotted here.  The stench is terrible.
You hold your breath (and your lunch) and get outta here.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Paladin's Guild
rooms.Description:
This area doesn't look like it belongs in this city.  The main reason is that
it's clean.  I mean white glove test clean.  You see some flowers in a vase
here.  It looks a lot better than the rest of the city does.

rooms.Name: Into the Holy Light
rooms.Description:
Standing here you feel the power of your clan running through you.  You
remember taking your oath as a Paladin.  Before you leave, as you know you
must do, you bow your head in a silent prayer asking for strength to carry
you on into doing right.

rooms.Name: A Side Street
rooms.Description:
You hold your nose as you come into this area.  This place is definitely the
worst you have ever seen.  Suddenly a throwing star blows by your head and
sticks itself in the wall behind you.  You decide to leave while you still
can.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Cleric's Guild
rooms.Description:
A few small crosses are all over the walls here.  Maybe they believe that
religion helps in healing the soul and the body as well as the mind.  There
are steps leading upstairs.

rooms.Name: Sanctuary
rooms.Description:
You feel a sense of safety as you stand here.  It feels kind of nice after
everything you have been through in your life so far. Such peace, such
tranquillity, such.... aww the heck with it.  You know you want to go fight
some more, so get going.  Why waste your time here?

rooms.Name: Entrance to Anti-Paladin's Guild
rooms.Description:
This place has a creepy feel to it.  The ax that's in the wall that is about
your height doesn't make you feel better.  This place is definitely bad for
your health.  You might want to bail out while the bailing is good.

rooms.Name: A Dark and Secret Room
rooms.Description:
Thanks to your special Anti-Paladin abilities, you are the only one able to
see in this total darkness.  Looks like some others were discussing plans
until you showed up. Maybe you best be getting along.

rooms.Name: Too Dark to See Anything
rooms.Description: It's too dark to see anything. You better keep going.

rooms.Name: A Side Street
rooms.Description:
Some trashcans are barely seen with all the mounds of trash that is lying here.
As you look around you see a poster on the wall.  It's a bounty poster.
The picture is that of a male with some type of metal implant in his head.
Unfortunately, the name of the character has been ripped off.  But for now
you have your own mission (whatever that is.)

rooms.Name: Entrance To Warrior's Guild
rooms.Description:
You feel a sense of good friendship as you enter here.  You feel that whatever
happens out there, all of it stops at the door.  Here you could relax and enjoy
good company.

rooms.Name: Peace and Tranquility
rooms.Description:
You feel a sense of deep calm and peacefulness here.  You feel emotions that
you could never explain to others.  Sadly you wipe a tear from your eye as you
know you must leave the area.

rooms.Name: The Practice Room
rooms.Description:
People are showing new attack skills to others here.  You notice that the
swords are blunt, and that it is padded along the walls and floor.

rooms.Name: A Side Street
rooms.Description:
There's enough garbage around here to make this place a dump.  Suddenly a wind
blows some paper into your face.  As you look at it, you notice that it's a
picture.  It shows 2 creatures with four arms and underneath the caption says
"ARE YOU PREPARED?"  As you drop the photo back to the ground, you wonder
what other surprises are here.

rooms.Name: Entrance to The Theives Guild
rooms.Description:
Not exactly the most cheeriest place you've been to.  Suddenly you notice
that all around you there is an array of weapons and armor that is just
laying here.  As you look closer at all this stuff,  it is either worseless
junk or it is stamped "Property of Theives Guild."  Looks like though there
isn't anything here that is worth taking.

rooms.Name: A Smoky Area
rooms.Description:
Where is all that smoke coming from?  This question keeps popping up in your
mind as you look (look? yeah right) around in here.  You think you see a way
north but it might be easier to go back down the way you came.

rooms.Name: The Room of Stealth and Darkness
rooms.Description:
Shadows move swiftly here in the gloom.  In the smoky dark you can barely see
shapes standing rigid around the area.  You think you see somebody that is in
the middle of the room.  Looks like the boss.

rooms.Name: The Trading Store of The Chipmunks and The Chipettes
rooms.Description:
Of all the places to find, you would never think to find a place like this
here.  Yet here it is in the middle of nowhere.  This is the only trading
center for miles around so you hope there is something good here.  At least
the place is clean.  You hope the goods here are as clean as the store.
Knowing Alvin's reputation though you seriously doubt it.

rooms.Name: A Small Church
rooms.Description:
A large cross is on the front wall here.  This doesn't look like a practice
area but it is.  You notice other paladins looking at you.  They smile and go
back to their prayers in silence.

rooms.Name: The Anti-Paladin's Training Center
rooms.Description:
With books of sinister spells on the shelves, a dark atmosphere, and plenty
of weapons covered with a dry sticky stuff (probably blood), you feel there's
no place like home.  In fact you could call this home.  But you have other
things to do now, so you decide to practice now and come back and "play"
with your "friends" later.

rooms.Name: The Cleric's Room of Silence
rooms.Description:
You hear absolutely nothing in this room.  You notice rows and rows of jars
with faded labels on them and many books of magic on the shelves and on the
tables.  Definitely a place of knowledge.

rooms.Name: The Post Office
rooms.Description:
A small post office is set up here.  You may want to send a letter to someone
but like anything else around here, it will probably be delayed quite a while.
Still, it's the only one around.

rooms.Name: Your First Battle
rooms.Description:
Welcome to the Arena of Mortal Kombat.  Here you will find that there is no
retreat, no surrender.  People from all over come here to fight (and die)
to have a crack at winning the big one.  But it all starts here.

rooms.Name: The Courtyard
rooms.Description:
Congratulations on beating your first challenge, but it only gets worse the
further you continue in the tournament. By now the crowds have gathered on the
sides above you because of course they want to see death and destruction but
they wouldn't want to sit on the spikes that have now suddenly appeared on
your left and right.  There's no way out of here now. You have to go on.

rooms.Name: The Courtyard
rooms.Description:
You've done well to get this far in the tournament.  As you look on the spikes
you see dried blood, a few destroyed pieces of equipment and a head or two on
the spikes.  Suddenly you hear a scream from above and watch in horror as a
body drops onto the spikes right beside you.  The blood splashes everywhere
all over you.  You try to get your mind back onto the business at hand.

rooms.Name: Hall of Champions
rooms.Description:
You notice statues of people who first defeated Shang Tsung here.  You see the
statues of Liu Kang, Sonya Blade, Kano, Sub-Zero, Johhny Cage, Rayden, and
Scorpion.  You also see a statue of a four armed creature. Aren't you glad
you don't have to face it?  Right now you better worry about your next
opponent because it's time to get down to business.

Exits.Description: A stone door is in the wall here

rooms.Name: First Leg Completed
rooms.Description:
Nice job in making it here.  As you look around you see that others have made
it this far as well.  They notice you and smile, but you wonder how far they
will go to actually win this tournament.  You can relax here but don't put
your guard down too much.

rooms.Name: Beginning the Second Leg of the Tournament
rooms.Description:
As you prepare yourself to continue on in the rankings of the tounament, you
notice a sign.
The sign says,

BECAUSE YOU HAVE MADE IT THIS FAR IN THE TOUNRNAMENT, WE HAVE DECIDED TO RAISE
THE STAKES HIGHER.  FOR YOUR NEXT BATTLES, YOU WILL BE FIGHTING OVER "THE PIT"
WHERE THERE IS NO CHANCE TO FLEE.  IF YOU FLEE, WELL LET'S JUST SAY IT WON'T
BE PLEASEANT. HAVE A NICE DAY.

SIGNED,

SHAO KAHN

This might be a good time to bail out while you can.

Exits.Description: A door is here leading to the second part of the tournament.

rooms.Name: Onto The Spikes
rooms.Description:
This wasn't exactly the wisest move you've ever done.  Once you stepped
onto the floor, hundreds upon hundreds of spikes rise up through the floor.
You can only stare helplessly in agony as the spikes go thorugh your feet
(EWW!), your legs (CRACK!), and through the rest of your body.....

Fortunately, you are dead by the time the spikes have reached your brain.

Sorry Mortal, but your Quest for Mortal Kombat Master is over.

rooms.Name: A Stone Walkway Above The Pit
rooms.Description:
You step out upon a solid stone walkway.  As you look around, you see that you
can fight and defend on it, but if you flee, well that's a different story.
But you have no time to think about that now.  Because one screwup and you might
find yourself on the "sharp" (not short) end of the stick.

rooms.Name: Further along the Stone Walkway
rooms.Description:
Now that you are used to fighting on such narrow grounds, you decide to take a 
look around below you.  All you see around you are dozens and dozens of spikes
with a few dead bodies sticking on some of them.  You get so engrossed in this
grisly sight that you almost are hit by a kick that your latest opponent sends
at you.  It's time that you concentrate on the task at hand.

rooms.Name: Travelling the Stone Pathway
rooms.Description:
You notice that this place is kept pretty clean (except of course those blood
spots you see everywhere).  Suddenly you notice somebody is just standing
there ABOVE the spikes in The Pit!.  How the heck did they do that?  Maybe
it's a clan secret cause you don't have a clue.  Either way, the road to
become Master does not come by a few cheap parlour tricks (though they could
help).

rooms.Name: Near the End of the Stone Pathway over The Pit
rooms.Description:
You can see the end of this most deadly and dangerous path in sight.  But
there is another opponent here waiting to take you on.  You look your opponent
over and think "This one doesn't look so tough." You stick with that thought
until your opponent unleashes one heck of an attack.  You better get going
before your over confidence causes your downfall.

Exits.Description: There's a door leading outta here.

rooms.Name: You Made It!
rooms.Description:
You made it this far which is impressive.  You notice that there are very 
few others here with you.  Obviously they weren't prepared as you were.
Good luck on the final leg!

rooms.Name: Begining of the Third Leg of the Tournament
rooms.Description:
The only thing of real importance here is another sign.
This one says:

CONGRATULATIONS MORTAL FOR ARRIVING THIS FAR IN THE TOURNAMENT.  WE NOW
WILL INCREASE THE DIFFICULTY OF THE TOURNAMENT.  YOU WILL BE ENTERING WHAT
IS CALLED THE PIT II AND THE WARRIOR SHRINE. NOT ONLY WILL YOU MEET A FATEFUL
DEATH BELOW YOU BUT NOW YOU CAN DIE IF YOU JUMP TOO HIGH (ie. go up).  YOU
HAVE SHOWN WISDOM, COURAGE, AND POWER TO GET THIS FAR. CONTINUE AND PERHAPS
I WILL SEE YOU.

You notice at the bottom of the sign it says in small letters:
"so I can destroy you personally."

Exits.Description: The door leading to the final leg is to the north.

rooms.Name: Warrior Shrine/The Pit II
rooms.Description:
Wow!  Looks like Shao Kahn wasn't kidding about the spikes.  You notice them
very quickly since you almost ran into one entering the area.  As you look
down, you see some cement with what looks like cracks in it.  You wonder how
they got there.  In fact you're wondering so much you almost forgot about
your opponent.  Unfortunately, your opponent didn't.

rooms.Name: The Pit
rooms.Description:
Remember those spikes you passed as you walked through the first leg of your
journey?  Well now you are going to get a real up close and personal view of
them because YOU'RE FALLING.....

                                AND FALLING......

                                                 AND FALLING......

Until you SLAM onto the spikes below.

Sorry Mortal, but your Quest to be Master of Mortal Kombat ends here.

rooms.Name: The Pit
rooms.Description:
It looks like you made a big mistake because YOU'RE FALLING.........

AND FALLING.....

                  AND FALLING......
                                 SLAM! You landed on a ledge about 15 feet
above the spikes in the pit. (aren't you lucky).  To any other person you look
like you are walking on air.  The path leads west or there is a ladder taking
you back where you fell off.

rooms.Name: Hovering over the Spikes in The Pit
rooms.Description:
You follow the see through path to the wall on the far side of The Pit. Looks
like there is no where else to go but back the way you came.

Exits.Description: A door is in the wall here.

rooms.Name: Shao Kahn's Communication Center
rooms.Description:
You come into the Central Communications Center of the castle.  In the room
you see various pieces of equipment. Some of this includes walkie-talkies, a
telephone (in this era hmmm weird), a computer (even weirder), and a long
range two way radio.  You notice you aren't the only one in here.

rooms.Name: The Pit
rooms.Description:
Did you screw up big time here. Whether it was a typo or whatever your taking
a long drop. In other words YOU'RE FALLING......

                                                AND FALLING

                                                           AND FALLING......

SLAM!  You land on a ledge about 15 feet down. Lucky you. You see that the
ledge continues to the east. You also see a ladder going back up the way you
fell. Take your choice.

rooms.Name: Along the Ledge Above The Pit
rooms.Description:
At the end of the ledge, you end up right beside the wall.  Looks like
you won't find a shortcut to the top this way, so you might as well as go
back the way you came.

Exits.Description: There is a well worn door here in the wall.

rooms.Name: Shao Kahn's Prision
rooms.Description:
As you enter here, you notice two cells. One of them is open and so you check out the door.  You notice that the door
is freshly picked and you wonder who escaped from here.  Suddenly the door to
the other cage opens up and out comes a well muscled guy with a metal plate
that covers his right eye.  Looks like you're in trouble now.

rooms.Name: Warrior Shrine/The Pit II
rooms.Description:
You begin to wonder if all this effort is really worth it to get this far.
Suddenly THREE fireballs come from out of nowhere and miss you by inches.
Now while your trying to regroup from that, your opponent is trying to get
an early advantage. You better get moving before your either dead meat or
well done.

rooms.Name: Warrior Shrine/The Pit II
rooms.Description:
It's Practically raining fireballs here!!!! While whoever is shooting these
has lousy aim, once in a while one of these gets too close for comfort.  You 
better finish your opponent completely and get out of here while you are
still in one piece.

rooms.Name: Sanctuary
rooms.Description:
Now that you got past the first eleven Kombatants, Shao Kahn decides to give
you an early break.  You might as well take it because it will get worse
from here.

Exits.Description: A door is here to take you to the final areas of the tournament.

rooms.Name: Relief!!!!
rooms.Description:
You see another sign here.
This one reads:

MORTAL YOU HAVE EARNED THE RIGHT TO CONTINUE INTO THE HEART OF THE OUTWORLD
WHERE YOU SHALL FACE THE GREATEST OPPONENTS IN THE TOURNAMENT.  IF YOU SHOW
THAT YOU ARE POWERFUL ENOUGH, YOU MAY LIVE TO FACE ME, SHAO KAHN.

By the looks of the dust in this room, it seems that no one has been here for
quite some time (maybe never at all).  A portal suddenly opens up above you.
There's no turning back now.  Check your armor and equipment, catch your
breath and get going.

rooms.Name: Through the Portal
rooms.Description:
Stepping through the portal, you enter a dark forest.  Shadows wisp by you,
moaning and groaning.  You realize that these shadows are the souls of the
dead who have partaken in this tournament and failed.  As their punishment,
they now have to spend eternity here.  With a shiver down your spine, you may
think that you are now way over your head and that you should go no further.

rooms.Name: The Pit II
rooms.Description:
Here's a mathematical equation for you.  What do you get when you have your weight.....
 
           plus all the weight of your equipment......
 
                                                      dropping about thirty stories.....
 
            multiplied by about 9.8 meters/sec which is the speed you are falling.....
 
           and slam so hard into the concrete below that you actually bury
yourself six feet under?
 
The Answer is simple.  It equals YOUR DEATH!
 
Sorry Mortal, The Quest ends here for you.

rooms.Name: Warrior Shrine Spikes
rooms.Description:
Looks like your opponent must have nailed you a real good uppercut.  In fact
it was so good that you were lifted straight up.  Too bad you forgot about the
spiked ceiling.

Look at the bright side.  You won't have to worry about remembering anything
ever again.
Sorry Mortal, this ends this Quest for you.

rooms.Name: The Pit II
rooms.Description:
You know... taking drops off of very high ledges is not my idea of a good time.


In other words YOU ARE DROPPING LIKE A ROCK!

THUD!  Fortunately you found a ledge to be on. Aren't you a lucky person.
Maybe the gods are smiling on you or whatever.  The ledge leads to the west
and there's a ladder going back up to the other ledge.  Watch the spikes on 
the way back up.

rooms.Name: Along the Ledge
rooms.Description:
Not much to look at here.  Just the spikes above you and the spikes and cement
below you in the two Pits. Suddenly three fireballs land all around you! It's
time to get moving and quickly!!!

Exits.Description: A Green-Colored door is here in the wall.  Looks like a jade color.

rooms.Name: Jade's Room
rooms.Description:
As you come in here, you notice everything is made up of colored jade
glass.  From the light shades to even the jade-colored flooring.  You are so
much in awe that not until the last second you notice the Occupant of this
room.  Her name is Jade and she doesn't like trespassers.

rooms.Name: The Pit II
rooms.Description:
This is not what I would call a good career move.  Unfortuantely, you took a 
wrong step and now YOUR ENTIRE LIFE IS FLASHING IN FRONT OF YOUR EYES!!!!!!!!!

A
 H
  H
   H
    H
     H
      H
       H
          H.........

                   THUD!!!!  But what is this?  You landed on a ledge about
20 feet down from the other ledge.  You notice a ladder is going back up to
the ledge that you dropped from, and that the ledge also goes to the east.
Pick your pleasure.

rooms.Name: Along the ledge
rooms.Description:
With the spikes above and below you, you hope that the ground is firm below
you or the spikes won't drop on you.  Suddenly, three fireballs scatter the
ground around you. You better get out of here now cause right now you are a
sitting duck!

Exits.Description: A smoking black door is in the wall here.

rooms.Name: Smoke's Room
rooms.Description:
What is this place? There's enough shadows and smoke to put anyone to serious
coughing spells.  Although you can't be sure.  You think you see a figure in the
smoke.  As you look closer, you notice that smoke is actually coming from this
person.  Unfortunately, you ran into Smoke's domain, and he detests trespassers.
Looks like your luck just ran out.

rooms.Name: Shang Tsung's Room
rooms.Description:
Shang Tsung has lived well off of the tournament.  All around you you see
beautifully crafted works of art and dozens and dozens of paintings with
frames made out of gold, silver, and other precious metals.  Each of these
have embedded in them dozens upon dozens of gems such as diamonds, rubys,
emeralds, and sapphires.  Upon a solid gold throne you see Shang Tsung.
Shang Tsung notices you, then all of a sudden he turns into Reptile and then
just disappears.  Suddenly he reappears three feet in front of you, prepared
for battle.  You have a feeling that this won't be easy.

Exits.Description: A big, solid gold throne is here.
There's a door here to escape the throne room.  Better use it quick.

rooms.Name: Goro's Lair
rooms.Description:
If Shang Tsung's room was very nice, this place is a disaster zone.  In the
background, you see a lot of eyes and they're looking at YOU! Suddenly, you
hear a roar and you look around quickly.  There you come to face to face with
Goro, Prince of the Outworld.  He sees you and sends forth a massive fireball
but you duck it.  Get ready because this battle is going to take a while.

Exits.Description: A stone wall is blocking any furthur attempt to go on.

rooms.Name: Furthur into the Lair
rooms.Description:
Farther into the lair you notice that there are more eyes now then there were
before.  You feel like you are on parade for all these eyes and you want to
get out of here quickly.  To the north you see a glint of light.  It might be
the way out of this mess.  Suddenly a huge form steps in front of the light.
You think to yourself "This is not going to be pretty."

rooms.Name: Kintaro's Lair
rooms.Description:
As soon as you enter the room you run face to chest with Kintaro.  He heard
the battle sounds with you and Goro.  Now that you have stepped into his
domain, you are now his prey.  To your fortune you see a ladder leading up and
notices your desperate attempt to escape and yells "MORTAL YOU MUST FACE ME TO
GET THE KEY!!!!"  He then sends a fireball that knocks you off the ladder.
You better get ready to rumble 'cause it's going to be a long one.

Exits.Description: A trapdoor is above the ladder.

rooms.Name: Your Final Resting Place
rooms.Description:
As you leave the tunnel, you find yourself before a huge set of doors. Above
the doors you read "BEYOND THESE DOORS LIES THE ALL POWERFUL SHAO KAHN. MORTALS
TREMBLE IN FEAR!!!!"  With your fist you bang three times on the door.  The door
opens, and you step in.........

rooms.Name: Shao Kahn's Throne Room
rooms.Description:
"Welcome to your final battle Mortals!!!" Shao Kahn shouts and then he dashes
literally at you.  You've never seen a guy that large move that fast.  You 
barely escaped getting rammed and head toward the door that's north of you.
Unfortunately you find it locked up tight.  With a sigh of resignation, you
prepare yourself for the final battle.

Exits.Description: The door to finally end this journey is to the north.

rooms.Name: Victory!
rooms.Description:
Congratulations!  You have become one of the few, the proud, The Supreme
Mortal Kombat Master!  All the people are cheering you as you go around
the stadium.  Yet somehow you still get the feeling you aren't out of trouble
yet.

rooms.Name: The Throne of Mortal Kombat!!!
rooms.Description:
Here you are greeted by your new found fans.   Congratulations you have become
a Supreme Mortal Kombat Master.  Good job.  Now you can stay here and bask in
all your glory, but if you go down you'll return to Midgaard.

rooms.Name: The East Side of the Stadium
rooms.Description:
Looks like everyone came out in full force to meet you.  There's people
clapping, cheering, and just having a good time.  One person grabs you and
gives you a big kiss.  You could learn to like this.

rooms.Name: Along the East Side of the Stadium
rooms.Description: Just more people cheering for you.  Some people are even throwing flowers.

rooms.Name: Edge of the Stadium Wall
rooms.Description:
While you are enjoying all this praise you better be careful up here.  Looking
down over the edge you see some green goo at the bottom of the castle. This 
goo doesn't look too friendly either.

rooms.Name: Behind The Throne
rooms.Description:
You keep looking around cause you have this feeling of being attacked. But you
don't see anyone or anything around.  While you are looking you look at this
"goo" down at the bottom of the castle.  Definitely not friendly looking, in
fact it looks downright nasty.

rooms.Name: Western Edge of the Stadium
rooms.Description:
You love these fans.  They cheer you on and on and you are loving every minute
of it.  Yet somehow you feel you are being stalked and you can't shake the
feeling.

rooms.Name: Along the Western Edge of the Stadium
rooms.Description:
You are being showered by tons of flowers and coins.  When you look closely
at the coins, you notice they have Shao Kahn's picture on them.  In other
words the coins are worthless.  You might keep one though for a souvenir.

rooms.Name: Western Side of the Stadium
rooms.Description:
You are loved and adored as you come over here.  You shake some hands, give
out your autograph, and are even kissed by some women.  They cheer more when
you show off some of your fighting moves.  But you can't help feeling that
someone's out there and he's watching you........

rooms.Name: The Acid Pool
rooms.Description:
With you being so over-confident, you didn't notice you were too far to the
edge until it was too late.  As you fall you hear screams of fear and dismay,
and your own scream is of terror.

DOWN........

           DOWN......

                       DOWN you go all the way to the bottom......

SPLASH!  Right into the goo.  Suddenly this goo begins EATING YOU! This isn't
goo, It's ACID!!! You scream desperately as the acid begins to eat through 
your equipment, your skin, and finally your muscles.....

Fortunately you died before the acid got to your brain.
*Anyone for nice fresh skeleton?*
Sorry Master, you just died.

rooms.Name: T&E's Pizza Parlor
rooms.Description:
MMMMMM Boy!  Does it smell good in here.  The smell of pizza here fills the
whole room.  Looking around you see other mouthwatering goodies as well.

rooms.Name: Brittany's Armor Shop
rooms.Description:
Talk about being in the pink here.  This entire place is painted pink.  Looking
around you also see dozens of pictures covering the place.  Looking closer you
see that most of the pictures are of Brittany herself but every now and then
you see a picture of the Chipettes in general or even one including the
Chipmunks as well.  But this isn't Memory Lane, so I guess you better go about 
your business.

rooms.Name: Alvin's Weapons Shop
rooms.Description:
Boy is this place a mess!!!  You see boxes and crates of stuff just lying around
and you begin to wonder if this place is even ready to open.  Yet you do
see some glass cases with some weapons with price tags on them so they must be
ready to sell (at least you guess anyway).

rooms.Name: MK Shang Morphs holding block
rooms.Description: This room holds all extra morphs of Shang Tsung.

rooms.Name: Nightwolf's Sanctuary
rooms.Description:
Steping into the Earth Realm, you find yourself on holy ground.  The only person
here you see is a strong Native Americain chanting a prayer for the Earth
Warriors fighting for the survival of the realm.
